name: Gastrodon East Sea
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

poke_power.name: Osmotic Pressure
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Gastrodon West Sea in play, you may move up to 3 damage counters from Gastodon East Sea to 1 of your Gastrodon West Sea.

attacks.name: Dwindling Wave
attacks.effect: Does 80 damage minus 10 damage for each damage counter on Gastrodon East Sea.
